quote_first:
Say that again, Sergeant, asked Warren, although he was pretty sure he had heard her correctly the first time.
"A Royal Mail postal delivery van drove past a traffic camera at
quote_last: , about three quarters of a mile south-west of the sports centre."
quote_raw:
Say that again, Sergeant, asked Warren, although he was pretty sure he had heard her correctly the first time.
"A Royal Mail postal delivery van drove past a traffic camera at 21:41 hours, about three quarters of a mile south-west of the sports centre."
title: No Smoke Without Fire
author: Paul Gitsham
